verses.verse: <S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> to them, You have <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, and have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you:

You have not <S%H5800>left<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> but have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given <S%H5117>rest<s%> to your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> as he <S%H1696>promised<s%> them: therefore <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H6437>return<s%> you, and <S%H3212>get<s%> you to your <S%H168>tents,<s%> and to the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

But take <S%H3966>diligent<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> and the <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> you, to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and to <S%H1692>hold<s%> to him, and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them away: and they <S%H3212>went<s%> to their <S%H168>tents.<s%>

Now to the one <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> possession in <S%H1316>Bashan:<s%> but to the other <S%H2677>half<s%> thereof <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3220>westward.<s%> And <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them away <S%H1571>also<s%> to their <S%H168>tents,<s%> then he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them,

And he <S%H559>spoke<s%> to them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> with <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5233>riches<s%> to your <S%H168>tents,<s%> and with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> with <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and with <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and with <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H8008>raiment:<s%> <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> with your <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H3212>departed<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H272>possession,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> they were <S%H270>possessed,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1552>borders<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> by <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H4758>see<s%> to.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> have <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> in the <S%H1552>borders<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H5676>passage<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it, the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> themselves together at <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H6635>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%>

And with him <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5387>princes,<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H1>chief<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> a <S%H5387>prince<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and each <S%H376>one<s%> was an <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> among the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with them, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H4604>trespass<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that you have <S%H4603>committed<s%> against the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> away this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in that you have <S%H1129>built<s%> you an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that you might <S%H4775>rebel<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>

Is the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%> too <S%H4592>little<s%> for us, from <S%H834>which<s%> we are not <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> although there was a <S%H5063>plague<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%>

But that you must <S%H7725>turn<s%> away this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> and it will be, seeing you <S%H4775>rebel<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> he will be <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H389>Notwithstanding,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%> be <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> then <S%H5674>pass<s%> you <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H7931>dwells,<s%> and <S%H270>take<s%> <S%H270>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> us: but <S%H4775>rebel<s%> not against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against us, in <S%H1129>building<s%> you an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H1107>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Did not <S%H5912>Achan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> in the <S%H2764>accursed<s%> thing, and <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H1961>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> and that <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1478>perished<s%> not <S%H259>alone<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> to the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods,<s%> he <S%H3045>knows,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> he shall <S%H3045>know;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> it be in <S%H4777>rebellion,<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> in <S%H4604>transgression<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3467>(save<s%> us not <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%>)

That we have <S%H1129>built<s%> us an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> to <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering <S%H4503><s%>or meat offering, or <S%H518>if<s%> to <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> let the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> himself <S%H1245>require<s%> it;

And <S%H518>if<s%> we have not rather <S%H6213>done<s%> it for <S%H1674>fear<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> In <S%H4279>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> might <S%H559>speak<s%> to our <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have you to do with the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> a <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us and you, you <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad;<s%> you have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> so shall your <S%H1121>children<s%> make our <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H3372>fearing<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Therefore we <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H6213>prepare<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> us an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> not for <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, <S%H3808>nor<s%> for <S%H2077>sacrifice:<s%>

But that it may be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us, and you, and our <S%H1755>generations<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> us, that we might <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him with our <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings, and with our <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and with our <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings; that your <S%H1121>children<s%> may not <S%H559>say<s%> to our <S%H1121>children<s%> in <S%H4279>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come,<s%> You have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Therefore <S%H559>said<s%> we, that it shall be, <S%H3588>when<s%> they should so <S%H559>say<s%> to us or to our <S%H1755>generations<s%> in <S%H4279>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come,<s%> that we may <S%H559>say<s%> again, <S%H7200>Behold<s%> the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H6213>made,<s%> not for <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings, <S%H3808>nor<s%> for <S%H2077>sacrifices;<s%> but it is a <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us and you.

God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that we should <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> for <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> for meat offerings, or for <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And when <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were with him, <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> it <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> them.

And <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> This <S%H3117>day<s%> we <S%H3045>perceive<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> us, <S%H834>because<s%> you have not <S%H4603>committed<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H227>now<s%> you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H5387>princes,<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H7725>brought<s%> them <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and did not <S%H559>intend<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> them in <S%H6635>battle,<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H5707>Ed:<s%> for it shall be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H430>God.<s%>
